properties.name: url
properties.label: URL
properties.description: Provide the URL to send the HTTP POST request.

properties.name: use_basic_auth
properties.label: Use Basic Auth
properties.description: Send the request using the Basic Authorization scheme.

properties.name: basic_auth_username
properties.label: Basic Auth - Username
properties.description: Provide the username for Basic Auth. Only required if Basic Auth is checked.

properties.name: basic_auth_password
properties.label: Basic Auth - Password
properties.description: Provide the password for Basic Auth. Only required if Basic Auth is checked.

properties.name: body
properties.label: Request Body
properties.description: Provide the request BODY to send. Optionally, leave this field blank to send the incoming Text Message's body.
